text:
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs'; import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem'; Add `weaviate-client` to your Python environment with `pip`.
**Please use the `v4` client with Weaviate `1.23.7` or higher.** ```bash pip install -U weaviate-client ``` Add `weaviate-client` to your Python environment with `pip`:

```bash pip install "weaviate-client==3.*" ``` Add `weaviate-client` to your project with `npm`:

```bash npm install weaviate-client --tag next ``` Add `weaviate-ts-client` to your project with `npm`:

```bash npm install weaviate-ts-client ``` Add `weaviate-go-client` to your project with `go get`:

```bash go get github.com/weaviate/weaviate-go-client/v4 ``` Add this dependency to your project:

```xml io.weaviate client 4.0.0 ```
name: Quickstart Clients.install
